desc.en: Sensei goes to the Black Market after receiving a message from Saori. Saori is unable to open a bank account because she needs a reference, so Sensei gladly becomes a guarantor.
desc.jp: Sensei goes to the Black Market after receiving a message from Saori. Saori is unable to open a bank account because she needs a reference, so Sensei gladly becomes a guarantor.
desc.zh_cn: 接到{cf沙织}的联系后来到黑市的老师。{cf沙织}因为无法证明身份而无法开户，老师便爽快地答应当她的保证人。

desc.en: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.
desc.jp: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第105首曲子，尤其用于阿里乌斯(奥利斯)分校的学生。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Aru is waiting for a loan interview at the Stygian Bank when the masked members of the Foreclosure Task Force burst in and steal all the bank's money. The Black Market Guard gives chase, and Aru admires the students' act of pure villainy.
desc.jp: Aru is waiting for a loan interview at the Stygian Bank when the masked members of the Foreclosure Task Force burst in and steal all the bank's money. The Black Market Guard gives chase, and Aru admires the students' act of pure villainy.
desc.zh_cn: {cf亚瑠}在暗黑银行等着贷款审查，此时蒙面的{cn对策委员会}学生们出现在她面前把现金偷走。黑市保镳紧追在{cn对策委员会}一行人身后。{cf亚瑠}对{cn对策委员会}学生让自己看见的坏蛋的真面目投以充满憧憬的目光。

desc.en: After waiting hours long for the loan interview, Aru eventually is rejected for a loan due to poor records and unable to mortgage any property. When arguing with the staff, Abydos breaks in.
desc.jp: After waiting hours long for the loan interview, Aru eventually is rejected for a loan due to poor records and unable to mortgage any property. When arguing with the staff, Abydos breaks in.
desc.zh_cn: 在银行等待了数小时的资质审查后，{cf亚瑠}最终因记录不良、无法进行财产抵押被拒绝贷款，而正与工作人员理论时，{sn阿拜多斯}一行人闯了进来。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: The Abydos threatens the staff to hand out the records, and accidentally takes out 100-million-worth money. Aru is greatly amazed while standing by the side; other members are just chilling there. After the robbery, the security calls for the Black Market guards, and everyone begins to engage.
desc.jp: The Abydos threatens the staff to hand out the records, and accidentally takes out 100-million-worth money. Aru is greatly amazed while standing by the side; other members are just chilling there. After the robbery, the security calls for the Black Market guards, and everyone begins to engage.
desc.zh_cn: {sn阿拜多斯}一行人威胁工作人员交出了记录，顺便把一亿日元的资金给拿了出来。{cf亚瑠}在旁边大为震撼，极为赞叹；{sn其他}成员在旁边静静观察。抢完后，银行保安叫来了黑市守卫，众人随即开始作战。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: After the fact, Sensei receives a letter from Ayane. Though the Foreclosure Task Force wasn't able to pay off its debt in full, she thanks [USERNAME] Sensei for preserving the group's usual way of life.
desc.jp: After the fact, Sensei receives a letter from Ayane. Though the Foreclosure Task Force wasn't able to pay off its debt in full, she thanks [USERNAME] Sensei for preserving the group's usual way of life.
desc.zh_cn: 所有事件结束后，老师收到{cf绫音}寄来的信。{cf绫音}向[USERNAME]老师道谢说，虽然没完全还清债务，但是多亏了老师才守住{cn对策委员会}的日常。

desc.en: Thanks to Sensei's help, the Foreclosure Task Force has been officially recognized as a club in the school, and will be taking the role as the Student Council. Yet the President remains undecided.
desc.jp: Thanks to Sensei's help, the Foreclosure Task Force has been officially recognized as a club in the school, and will be taking the role as the Student Council. Yet the President remains undecided.
desc.zh_cn: 由于老师的帮助，{cn对策委员会}现在被正式认定为学校的社团，承担{sn阿拜多斯}学生会的职务，不过学生会长是谁尚未决定。

desc.en: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.jp: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.
desc.zh_cn: 柴大将是一位在阿拜多斯校区附近经营着一个名叫“柴犬拉面”的餐厅老板，也是茜香打工的上司。

desc.en: Kaiser Credit had been under investigation by the General Student Council since then, for conducting illegal financial transactions in the black market. The director had also been listed as the main suspects in the illegal student kidnapping case and is wanted. In order to distance themselves from the incidents, Kaiser Corporation fired the director immediately. Loan-wise, interest rates have finally come down to even lower levels than ever before.
desc.jp: Kaiser Credit had been under investigation by the General Student Council since then, for conducting illegal financial transactions in the black market. The director had also been listed as the main suspects in the illegal student kidnapping case and is wanted. In order to distance themselves from the incidents, Kaiser Corporation fired the director immediately. Loan-wise, interest rates have finally come down to even lower levels than ever before.
desc.zh_cn: 凯撒信贷已因在黑市进行非法金融交易而受到联邦学生会的调查，且凯撒公司董事也被列为学生非法劫持案的主要嫌疑人，并遭到通缉。凯撒公司为撇清关系，立刻解雇了董事。贷款方面，利息最终降到了比原来还低的水平。

曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: 對策委員會其他人聽到綾音要走堅決不同意，表示如果要走大家就要一起走。大家的理由是，如果會發生戰鬥，人手越多越好，而且更重要的是他們要親手帶回白子。綾音提醒眾人這個計劃並不是百分百成功，就在這時一陣聲音打斷了綾音。
desc.jp: 對策委員會其他人聽到綾音要走堅決不同意，表示如果要走大家就要一起走。大家的理由是，如果會發生戰鬥，人手越多越好，而且更重要的是他們要親手帶回白子。綾音提醒眾人這個計劃並不是百分百成功，就在這時一陣聲音打斷了綾音。
desc.zh_cn: {cn对策委员会}{sn其他}人听到{cf绫音}要走坚决不同意，表示如果要走大家就要一起走。大家的理由是，如果会发生战斗，人手越多越好，而且更重要的是他们要亲手带回{cf白子}。{cf绫音}提醒众人这个计划并不是百分百成功，就在这时一阵声音打断了{cf绫音}。

desc.en: 便利屋全員來拜訪對策委員會眾人。亞瑠指出，這種時刻更不應該向後看，而應向前看。便利屋表示只要有老師在，一切一定都會成功。對策委員會回想起以前的種種，堅定了信心。
desc.jp: 便利屋全員來拜訪對策委員會眾人。亞瑠指出，這種時刻更不應該向後看，而應向前看。便利屋表示只要有老師在，一切一定都會成功。對策委員會回想起以前的種種，堅定了信心。
desc.zh_cn: 便利屋全员来拜访{cn对策委员会}众人。{cf亚瑠}指出，这种时刻更不应该向后看，而应向前看。便利屋表示只要有老师在，一切一定都会成功。{cn对策委员会}回想起以前的种种，坚定了信心。

desc.en: The 45th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for Abydos High School. It is often used with members from Abydos High School with situation improving. A notable usage is the strategy planning for rescuing Hoshino.

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第三十二首曲子，阿拜多斯高中的主题曲。常用于阿拜多斯高中成员出现且情况转好时。一个比较著名的使用例是大家在计划救出星野的时候。

desc.en: 遊戲開發部對生命守護者並非真正意義上的戰艦而感到失望，同時也因為計劃的可行性不高而想打退堂鼓。愛麗絲堅決要去，她認為自己是船上唯一攜帶著武器的人，她想保護大家，為大家作出些貢獻。柚子對愛麗絲的想法表示贊同，說明她不想再讓大家分開――況且，還有老師在呢。柚子說正是因為愛麗絲才讓她走到了今天這一步，提議大家還是一起去最好；桃井和綠最後接受。
desc.jp: 遊戲開發部對生命守護者並非真正意義上的戰艦而感到失望，同時也因為計劃的可行性不高而想打退堂鼓。愛麗絲堅決要去，她認為自己是船上唯一攜帶著武器的人，她想保護大家，為大家作出些貢獻。柚子對愛麗絲的想法表示贊同，說明她不想再讓大家分開――況且，還有老師在呢。柚子說正是因為愛麗絲才讓她走到了今天這一步，提議大家還是一起去最好；桃井和綠最後接受。
desc.zh_cn: {cn游戏开发部}对生命守护者并非真正意义上的战舰而感到失望，同时也因为计划的可行性不高而想打退堂鼓。{cf爱丽丝}坚决要去，她认为自己是船上唯一携带着武器的人，她想保护大家，为大家作出些贡献。{cf柚子}对{cf爱丽丝}的想法表示赞同，说明她不想再让大家分开――况且，还有老师在呢。{cf柚子}说正是因为{cf爱丽丝}才让她走到了今天这一步，提议大家还是一起去最好；{cf桃井}和{cf绿}最后接受。

desc.en: 愛麗絲說自己也曾害怕過，因為Kei仍在愛麗絲的資料中。愛麗絲提起老師跟她談論“自己選擇成為什麼”的事情，表示自己這次想要成為勇者。所有人支援愛麗絲的話，表示愛麗絲要成為“宇宙勇者”了。
desc.jp: 愛麗絲說自己也曾害怕過，因為Kei仍在愛麗絲的資料中。愛麗絲提起老師跟她談論“自己選擇成為什麼”的事情，表示自己這次想要成為勇者。所有人支援愛麗絲的話，表示愛麗絲要成為“宇宙勇者”了。
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}说自己也曾害怕过，因为Kei仍在{cf爱丽丝}的数据中。{cf爱丽丝}提起老师跟她谈论“自己选择成为什么”的事情，表示自己这次想要成为勇者。所有人支持{cf爱丽丝}的话，表示{cf爱丽丝}要成为“宇宙勇者”了。

desc.en: Members of Momoyodou visit the summer beach for a new business venture. However, they realize they got scammed in an insidious scheme! Shizuko declares that she will not go down like this and a new Momoyodou battle begins!
desc.jp: Members of Momoyodou visit the summer beach for a new business venture. However, they realize they got scammed in an insidious scheme! Shizuko declares that she will not go down like this and a new Momoyodou battle begins!
desc.zh_cn:
为了打开新的事业「海之家」，百夜堂一行人来到了渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是渡假胜地之间的权利争夺「Resort・Battle Royal」。
究竟{cf静子}能否顺利守护「海之家」呢──！？百夜堂崭新的战斗，即刻开始。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
